content:
Extensions Class

Definition

Provides a set of extension methods for tracing.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)]
public static class Extensions
Inheritance
Object
Extensions
Attributes
System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable

Methods

ToInvariantString(Exception)

Returns a culture-independent string representation of the given exception object, appropriate for diagnostics tracing.
